title: Trading mystery gifts
body:
Hey guys I as just wondering if anyone wanted to gift each other mystery skins as the self gifting has ended.

If you do add me :) on i mid andi carry

replies.body: Hello, personally I don't think its a great idea mystery trading with strangers over the internet. It would be a lot safer too trade with someone you know and trust. Good luck.
why is so many people doing this
